505510.name: Fantasy Grounds - AAW Map Pack Collection IV
505510.description:
AAW Map Pack Vol 4

This collection of maps custom built for the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop contains dozens of incredible maps for use in your campaign.
This four part collection contains all cartography released by from 2011-2016, the maps are usable in any game system.
AAW Map Pack (Volume #4) contains 56 maps of various types and sizes.
Inside you will find:
  • Maps of various residential buildings from rich palace to poor tent
  • Five wild forest maps and several forest shrines
  • Maps of different cavern lairs.
  • Three city maps.
  • Eight overland maps.
  • Two maps for city encounters.
  • Linked miniatures for all map types.
Works with all rulesets.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
